post.author: 김세환
post.content:
Position:  Mainframe Developer/Designer

Required:  Individual MUST have 4+ years Cobol experience as a Developer/Designer. Individual MUST have 4+ years CICS and FOCUS experience, and 3+ years with IDMS.  Individual MUST have experience working in a Capital Markets/Wealth Management environment.  Strong Development and Design experience is required.  Recent working experience for a large financial institution is preferred.  Ability to communicate effectively with team members and end user is required.  

Please do not apply if you do not meet these qualifications.  


Location:  Toronto (Downtown)
Duration: 6 months
Rate/Salary: Negotiable
Start Date: ASAP

We would like to thank you for your interest.  Please note that all submissions will be assessed.  However, only suitable candidates will be contacted further.
Please submit your most recent resume to:
Melissa Douglas
Technical Recruiter, Procom
MelissaD@procom.ca
post.title: Contract position..
